title: New Zealand national rugby union team
summary: The New Zealand men's national rugby union team (Māori: Tīma whutuporo a-motu o Aotearoa), commonly known as the All Blacks  (Māori: Ōpango), represents New Zealand in men's international rugby union, which is considered the country's national sport.[3] The team won the Rugby World Cup in 1987, 2011 and 2015.
